Niger, Mali and Burkina Faso say they are leaving ECOWAS regional blockThree West African junta-led states Niger, Mali and Burkina Faso said on Sunday that they are leaving the Economic Community of West African States immediately, according to a joint statement read out on Niger national television. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:13:49 GMT LMGANYGWGNMRLN66YZ6FDSX2OI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/niger-mali-burnkina-faso-say-they-are-leaving-ecowas-regional-block-2024-01-28/Reuters世界非洲
China allows Philippines to supply troops at disputed reefThe Chinese coastguard said it had made "temporary special arrangements" to allow the Philippines to deliver supplies to troops at a grounded World War Two-era vessel at a disputed reef. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:08:48 GMT QJOFB6IFDFI6FBPCTUZU3EAAGU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-allows-philippine-supply-troops-disputed-reef-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pope calls for an end to wars, urges respect for civiliansPope Francis on Sunday urged respect for civilians in conflict areas and said people were tired of wars, which he called a "disaster for the peoples and a defeat for humanity". Sun, 28 Jan 2024 12:43:29 GMT BKANTTKFJFPG3DUQ4OO47JID4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-calls-an-end-wars-urges-respect-civilians-2024-01-28/Reuters世界
French PM considers more help for farmers as protests persistThe French government is considering further help for the country's farmers, Prime Minister Gabriel Attal said on Sunday, as their nationwide protests to demand better pay and living conditions showed no sign of abating. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 12:21:54 GMT C6Z4T7IY7FOXHOV6XE6XWDHMFM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-pm-considers-more-help-farmers-protests-persist-2024-01-28/Reuters商业工作世界
Masked gunmen kill one person in Istanbul Catholic churchTwo masked gunmen shot one person dead during Sunday service at a church in Istanbul, Interior Minister Ali Yerlikaya said, adding that authorities were working to capture the assailants. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 11:47:47 GMT EUYJLDZNYBPBFDWPBYXK4F7Z7I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/masked-gunmen-kill-one-person-stanbul-church-turkish-interior-minister-2024-01-28/Reuters世界中东地区
More Palestinians displaced as Israel battles Hamas in south GazaMedical facilities are at risk of collapse in Khan Younis, the southern Gaza city now at the focus of Israel's offensive, the Gaza Health Ministry warned on Sunday, as fighting raged across the Palestinian enclave. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 11:12:26 GMT 2BM5X7IG6FORCESJ5XMDU6UEOQE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/more-palestinians-displaced-israel-battles-hamas-south-gaza-2024-01-28/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东地区
Climate change activists aim soup at 'Mona Lisa' in Paris LouvreTwo climate change activists hurled soup at the protective glass in front of the world-famous "Mona Lisa" painting in Paris' Louvre museum on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 11:04:02 GMT VMOV4MV45BJ4JOTJN4O5UYEFII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/climate-change-activists-aim-soup-mona-lisa-paris-louvre-2024-01-28/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
UN vows to punish Palestinian agency staffers, urges reversal of funding pauseAt least nine countries paused funding for the UN refugee agency for Palestinians after Israel said some of its staff were involved in the Oct. 7 Hamas attacks on Israel. Most of Gaza's population depends on the aid that UNRWA provides. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 10:30:13 GMT QNOYHNOJ45ORZHR7WHWFXVRD2U https://www.reuters.com/world/un-urged-countries-reverse-funding-pause-palestinian-agency-2024-01-28/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Emma Farge世界
Uganda says judge's dissent from World Court ruling on Israel does not reflect its positionUganda has distanced itself from an opinion written by a Ugandan judge on the International Court of Justice (ICJ) dissenting from the panel's ruling in South Africa's genocide case against Israel, and said the remarks do not reflect Uganda's position. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 09:40:09 GMT EXWH67SHOFP7ZEOSLZWIZYD7ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uganda-says-judges-dissent-world-court-ruling-israel-does-not-reflect-its-2024-01-28/Reuters世界中东地区
Australia's New South Wales state premier condemns neo-Nazi rallyThe premier of Australia's New South Wales state condemned on Sunday a neo-Nazi rally in the state capital Sydney as "appalling", a day after Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said neo-Nazism was on the rise in the country. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 05:38:44 GMT PZ2AP6VSDJKUBMHAKOLKS672VY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australias-new-south-wales-state-first-condemnation-neo-nazi-rally-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Guterres: UN to punish staffers involved in 'terror'United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres vowed on Sunday to hold to account "any U.N. employee involved in acts of terror" after allegations that some refugee agency staffers were involved in the Oct. 7 Hamas attacks on Israel. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 05:03:35 GMT R6WKHG3URVPSDNZI7DKNCLWAU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/guterres-un-punish-staff-involved-恐怖主义-urges-unrwa-funding-2024-01-28/Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
